subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The 135th ranked Mario Ancic of Croatia defeated Marcos Baghdatis of Cyprus, 6-4, 6-2, to gain the Open 13 final against Andy Murray of Britain in Marseille, France. The fourth-seeded Murray beat No. 8 Paul-Henri Mathieu of France, 6-2, 6-2.
snippet: The 135th ranked Mario Ancic of Croatia defeated Marcos Baghdatis of Cyprus, 6-4, 6-2, to gain the Open 13 final against Andy Murray of Britain in Marseille, France. The fourth-seeded Murray beat No. 8 Paul-Henri Mathieu of France, 6-2, 6-2.
